snippets.copy_text:
For those who reject performative travel.

Wilderness doesn't solve problems—it reveals them.

This isn't for everyone. NOT for weekend revelers. Silence trumps celebration here.

But if you know, you know.

Your address is waiting.

Then I discovered: You cannot outrun a life you never chose.

Now? I measure it by belonging

10% is enough. You are enough.
